trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 包含集合<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The TransformerInfoCollection class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `transformers` section of the `webParts` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: TransformerInfoCollection 類別可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`transformers`區段`webParts`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> objects, as part of a TransformerInfoCollection, specify custom classes that extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>物件，在 TransformerInfoCollection，指定自訂擴充類別的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer></xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>

trans-unit.source: These transformer classes act as bridges between connected Web Parts, translating data sent by a connection provider into something that the connection consumer can accept.
trans-unit.target: 這些轉換程式類別做為連線的 Web 組件之間的橋樑，轉譯資料連接提供者傳送到連接取用者可以接受的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The TransformerInfoCollection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: TransformerInfoCollection 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Transformers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection> class always contains an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Transformers%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection>類別一定會包含執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection>型別。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfoCollection> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsSection.Transformers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use this instance, rather than creating your own.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體，而不是建立您自己使用。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref>物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection must not already contain a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object with the same <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo.Name%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 集合必須已經包含<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>物件具有相同<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo.Name%2A>屬性值。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"> </xref>物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref>從集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method removes all <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> objects from the collection and inserts a `clear` element into the `transformers` collection of the `webParts` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除所有<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>集合的物件，並將插入`clear`項目插入`transformers`集合`webParts`組態檔區段。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo"></xref> object at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TagMapInfo"></xref>位於指定的索引位置的物件。

trans-unit.source: The Item property overwrites the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object if it already exists; otherwise, a new object is created and added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此項目屬性會覆寫<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>物件已經存在; 否則新的物件已建立，並加入至集合。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>

trans-unit.source: The index of a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object at the specified index, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no object at that index.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"> </xref>於指定索引處的物件或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有該索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object with the passed <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo.Name*> property value from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref>物件與傳入<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo.Name*>從集合的屬性值。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo.Name*>

trans-unit.source: This method removes a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object from the collection and, if the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object is defined in a higher-level configuration file, inserts a `remove` element into the `transformers` collection of the `webParts` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>集合中的物件並在<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>物件定義在較高層級的組態檔中，插入`remove`項目插入`transformers`集合`webParts`組態檔區段。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>

trans-unit.source: The name of a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref>要從集合中移除物件。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object from the collection at the passed index.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref>從集合中傳遞的索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method removes a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object from the collection and, if the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> object is defined in a higher-level configuration file, inserts a `remove` element into the `transformers` collection of the `webParts` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>集合中的物件並在<xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>物件定義在較高層級的組態檔中，插入`remove`項目插入`transformers`集合`webParts`組態檔區段。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo>

trans-unit.source: The index of a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.TransformerInfo"></xref>要從集合中移除物件。
